events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving their vehicle and another on the highway during heavy rain.
Claim categorized under auto accident based on customer description including keywords vehicle and collision.
Agent John Smith has been assigned to handle the auto accident claim for further processing.
Acknowledgment of claim was sent to the customer along with information on next steps.
Request sent for police report and photos of vehicle damage to support the auto accident claim.
Customer submitted police report, photographs of damaged vehicle, and witness statement as requested.
Investigation initiated to verify details of the collision and liability based on submitted documents.
Investigation concluded confirming customer was not at fault in the vehicle collision incident.
A settlement amount covering repair costs and rental vehicle has been proposed to the customer.
Customer responded positively, expressing appreciation for prompt handling and proposed settlement.
The claim has been approved after customer acceptance of the settlement terms without objections.
Payment covering the settled amount was issued to customerâ€™s bank account promptly on approval day.
Claim closed following successful payment and confirmation of customer satisfaction with resolution.
